case_title: KORA KHAN vs DIRECTOR-GENERAL AGRICULTURE DEPARTMENT, GOVERNMENT OF BALOCHISTAN and another
respondents: Director-General Agriculture Department, Government of Balochistan
legal_basis: Section 4 of the Balochistan Service Tribunals Act, 1974

facts.initial_appointment: Junior Clerk in Agriculture Department on 1990-07-23
facts.reason_for_termination: Absence due to false involvement in FIR No. 10192 under Section 302 PPC

acquittal_details.trial_court: Additional District and Sessions Judge Sibi

appellant.contention: Dismissal was unjust due to false involvement in a criminal case and subsequent acquittal. Entitled to reinstatement with back benefits.

respondent.contention: Appellant remained absent from duty and was not acquitted honourably.

findings.absence: Not wilful or deliberate; caused by false FIR.
findings.acquittal: All acquittals are honourable; no distinction made.
findings.delay: Condoned as delay was not intentional.

decision.reinstatement: Appellant reinstated in service from dismissal date.
decision.back_benefits: Not granted; absence treated as extraordinary leave without pay.
